alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:03AM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Franklin and Western Essex Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with areas of blowing snow and significantly reduced visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause isolated power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near zero wind chill values are expected tonight, which increases the risk of cold exposure or hypothermia for travelers who get disoriented or stranded.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex
